author: doogie
msg: DecoratorSection was already fetching its name attribute from the
element; so call getName() on it, instead of fetching the attribute

author: doogie
msg: Remember the node's systemId, startColumn, and startLine, and use them

author: doogie
msg: Enable tracking of xml node positions when reading documents.

author: doogie
msg: Add systemId to xml node location tracking; this is based on the
docDescription passed in, which in normal cases is the URL.

author: doogie
msg: Add ReturnHeader.supplierRmaId, an informational header, to provide a
field to support tracking of rmas by suppliers.
